column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/d29a6037cf283503646a3d02a1e46d507882b6e4 for binaries and test log.\n
This seems like a much better way to do it.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/fa45c26a0e5d3597814cef5ebd64e3db1b3b017d for binaries and test log.\n
In case there is not enough disk space to do pre-allocation, we probably want to fail gracefully, instead of not just preallocating.\n
If the CheckDiskSpae check is moved to FindBlockPos (ACK on that), I don't think we need it here anymore at all.\n

Good catch, I'll update that.

Edit: Removed...
@sipa See below, we now return error() on a failed check.\n
